quote: And Jehovah God built the rib that he had taken from the man into a woman, and he brought her to the man.
Later she bore a son, and he named him Gerʹshom, for he said, “I have become a foreign resident in a foreign land.”
Also, when the time came for purifying them according to the Law of Moses, they brought him up to Jerusalem to present him to Jehovah,
